title: Delicious Delicious Hinamatsuri
detail_text: <:th_ch0202/>Nico-Senpaaai♪ Today is Hinamatsuri! The festival of girls! Come come, pleaaase eat the delicious delicious plum paste filled bread rolls that Kasumin prepared!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>(Kufufu! It’s a plan to make Nico-senpai fat after all~!)<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Oh, what a coincidence. I also have prepared a few snacks for Hinamatsuri. Hina-arare with Hishi Mochi, there’s also some Chirashi Zushi<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>(Fufun, I saw your plan from a mile away.  I’ll intercept it with a calorie attack that exceeds your bread rolls!)<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Fuwa-!! It looks delicious---!!! C-, can I, eat these? All of these??<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Of course. I also made sugar filled milk tea<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Nico-senpai, I love you! Thanks for the food!! *Munch munch*....Mnnn~~~~♪♪♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Then I guess I shall try your bread rolls too. *Munch*....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Wait, this is delicious! I-, I know I mustn't…. But I can’t stop~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Kasumin too~!! It wasn’t supposed to be like this~~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
